fields.headline: Premiership transfers in full
fields.bodyText: Arsenal In: Francis Jeffers (Everton, £8m) Giovanni van Bronckhorst (Rangers, £8.5m) Sol Campbell (Tottenham, free) Richard Wright (Ipswich, £6m) Inqi Hojsted (B36 Torshavn, free) Junichi Inamoto (Gamba Osaka, £4m).
